item.title: Resume
item.description: Kyle Wagner Senior level software engineer with a specialty in DevOps. Work Experience Senior Software Engineer - Devops/Automation - Xpansiv November 2018 to Present Lead automation engineer for deployment and QA pipelines. Specialist and evangelist for testing automation. Expert in Terraform and AWS Elastic Container Services Director of Quality Engineering / Lead DevOps Engineer - RiskSense, Inc January 2018 to October 2018 Managed the QA team and automation team and acted as release coordinator.
